meanings.definition: In a way that can be perceived or recognized
meanings.sent1: The music was discernibly loud, making it easy to hear.
meanings.sent2: She spoke discernibly, ensuring everyone understood her.
meanings.sent3: The cat discernibly pretended to be asleep to avoid going to the vet.
meanings.sent4: The stars were discernibly brighter in the clear night sky.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh bread was discernibly inviting.
